select distinct RES.*,RUN.title,RUN.start_user_id, RUN.start_user_name,RUN.start_user_org_text,RUN.start_user_position_text, RUN.business_key,RUN.business_flow_no,RUN.business_status,RUN.business_status_desc,RUN.process_definition_key,RUN.process_definition_name,RUN.create_time instance_create_time from ACT_RU_TASK RES left join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ left join ext_run_instance RUN on RES.PROC_INST_ID_= RUN.instance_id WHERE 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( <#-- RES.ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.EXECUTION_ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.PROC_INST_ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.NAME_ like '%${key}%' or RES.PARENT_TASK_ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.DESCRIPTION_ like '%${key}%' or RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ like '%${key}%' or RES.OWNER_ like '%${key}%' or RES.ASSIGNEE_ like '%${key}%' or RES.DELEGATION_ like '%${key}%' or RES.CATEGORY_ like '%${key}%' or RES.TENANT_ID_ like '%${key}%' or RES.FORM_KEY_ like '%${key}%' or
RUN.start_user_org_text like '%${key}%' or RUN.start_user_position_text like '%${key}%' or RUN.process_definition_key like '%${key}%' or RUN.process_definition_name like '%${key}%' or -->
RUN.title like '%${key}%' or RUN.business_flow_no = '%${key}%' or RUN.start_user_name like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#-- 放在前面有助于提升性能 ：待办日期 --> <#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(RES.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- 放在前面有助于提升性能 ：流程发起日期 --> <#if query.instanceCreateTimeBegin?? && query.instanceCreateTimeEnd??> and date_format(RUN.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.instanceCreateTimeEnd)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.instanceCreateTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and RES.ID_ in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if> <#if query.id??> and RES.ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.id)}' </#if>
<#if query.rev??> and RES.REV_ = ${query.rev} </#if>
<#if query.executionId??> and RES.EXECUTION_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.executionId)}' </#if>
<#if query.processInstanceId??> and RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processInstanceId)}' </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and RES.NAME_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.parentTaskId??> and RES.PARENT_TASK_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.parentTaskId)}' </#if>
<#if query.description??> and RES.DESCRIPTION_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.description)}' </#if>
<#if query.taskDefinitionKey??> and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.taskDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.taskDefinitionKeys??> <#assign list = StringUtil.split(query.taskDefinitionKeys,",") />
and RES.TASK_DEF_KEY_ in (
<#list list as taskDefinitionKey> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(taskDefinitionKey)}' <#if taskDefinitionKey_has_next> , </#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.owner??> and RES.OWNER_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.owner)}' </#if>
<#if query.assignee??> and RES.ASSIGNEE_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.assignee)}' </#if>
<#if query.delegation??> and RES.DELEGATION_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.delegation)}' </#if>
<#if query.priority??> and RES.PRIORITY_ = ${query.priority} </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(RES.CREATE_TIME_,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.dueDateBegin?? && query.dueDateEnd??> and date_format(RES.DUE_DATE_,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.dueDateBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.dueDateEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.category??> and RES.CATEGORY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.category)}' </#if>
<#if query.suspensionState??> and RES.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = ${query.suspensionState} </#if>
<#if query.tenantId??> and RES.TENANT_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantId)}' </#if>
<#if query.formKey??> and RES.FORM_KEY_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.formKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.title??> and RUN.title like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.title)}%' </#if> <#if query.startUserName??> and RUN.start_user_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserName)}%' </#if>
<#-- 专供非并发分支产生的待办查询，一个流程实例（业务主键）对应一个待办记录 --> <#if query.businessKey??> and RUN.business_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessKey)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and RUN.process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#-- 移动端启用 --> <#if query.enableMobile??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select ID_ from act_re_procdef where enable_mobile=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enableMobile)}) </#if>
<#-- 获取我的待办 --> <#if query.userId??> and ( 1=1 and (RES.ASSIGNEE_ = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} or (RES.ASSIGNEE_ is null and (I.USER_ID_ = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} or I.GROUP_ID_ IN (select g.GROUP_ID_ from ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP g where g.USER_ID_ = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)}) ) ) )
<#-- 含加签、转发 用户的待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward??> or RES.ID_ in (${query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward}) </#if> )
<#-- 去除加签\转发的"主人"待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward??> and RES.ID_ not in ( ${query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward} ) </#if> </#if>
<#-- 获取我的待办(多个用户) --> <#if query.userIds??> <#assign uids = StringUtil.split(query.userIds,",") /> and ( 1=1 and (RES.ASSIGNEE_ in ( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)} ) or (RES.ASSIGNEE_ is null and (I.USER_ID_ in ( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)} ) or I.GROUP_ID_ IN (select g.GROUP_ID_ from ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP g where g.USER_ID_ in ( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)} ) ) ) ) )
<#-- 含加签、转发 用户的待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward??> or RES.ID_ in (${query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward}) </#if> )
<#-- 去除加签\转发的"主人"待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward??> and RES.ID_ not in ( ${query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward} ) </#if> </#if>
<#-- 获取抄送给我的待办任务 <#if query.ccUserId??> and RES.ID_ in (select task_id from ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc where approve_action= 'copy_send' and assign_forward_cc_user_ids like '%,${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ccUserId)},%') </#if> -->
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} </#if>
</#if>

<#-- 我的待办辅助查询, （优化SQL做成分断查询） 含加签、转发 用户的待办 --> select task_id from ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc where 1=1 and approve_action in ( 'add_assign','forword_read') <#if query.userId??> and assign_forward_cc_user_ids like '%,${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)},%' </#if>
<#if query.userIds??> <#assign uids = StringUtil.split(query.userIds,",") /> and ( <#list uids as uid> assign_forward_cc_user_ids like '%,${uid},%' <#if uid_has_next> or </#if> </#list> ) </#if>

<#-- 我的待办辅助查询,（优化SQL做成分断查询）去除加签\转发的"主人"待办 --> select task_id from ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc where 1=1 and task_complete_type=0 and approve_action in ('add_assign','forword_read') <#if query.userId??> and approve_user_id=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} </#if>
<#if query.userIds??> and approve_user_id=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)} </#if>

<#assign uids = StringUtil.split(query.userIds,",") />
select task_id from ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc where ( <#list uids as uid> assign_forward_cc_user_ids like '%,${StringUtil.escapeSql(uid)},%' <#if uid_has_next> or </#if> </#list> ) and approve_action in ( 'add_assign','forword_read')

select task_id from ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc where 1=1 and task_complete_type=0 and approve_action in ('add_assign','forword_read') and approve_user_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)})

select distinct RES.*,RUN.title,RUN.start_user_id, RUN.start_user_name,RUN.start_user_org_text,RUN.start_user_position_text, RUN.business_key,RUN.process_definition_key,RUN.process_definition_name from ACT_RU_TASK RES left join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ left join ext_run_instance RUN on RES.PROC_INST_ID_= RUN.instance_id WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.approve_task_id ID_, A.process_instance_id PROC_INST_ID_ , A.definition_id PROC_DEF_ID_ , A.approve_task_name NAME_ ,approve_task_key TASK_DEF_KEY_,A.create_time CREATE_TIME_ , B.title,B.business_key, B.business_flow_no, B.business_status, B.business_status_desc, B.process_definition_name,B.process_definition_key, B.start_user_id,B.start_user_name,B.start_user_org_text,B.start_user_position_text ,B.create_time instance_create_time FROM ext_approve_opinion A left join ext_run_instance B on A.process_instance_id = B.instance_id where 1=1
<#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( B.start_user_name like '%${key}%' or B.process_definition_key like '%${key}%' or B.title like '%${key}%' or B.business_flow_no like '%${key}%' ) </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionId??> and A.definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and B.process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#-- 移动端启用 --> <#if query.enableMobile??> and A.definition_id in (select ID_ from act_re_procdef where enable_mobile=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enableMobile)}) </#if>
<#if query.title??> and B.title like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.title)}%' </#if>
<#-- 获取我的已办 --> <#if query.userId??> and A.approve_user_id = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} and A.approve_action!='start' union SELECT null ID_,instance_id PROC_INST_ID_ , process_definition_id PROC_DEF_ID_, -- CONCAT(process_definition_name,'- (',start_user_name,')') title NAME_ , null TASK_DEF_KEY_ ,create_time CREATE_TIME_, title, business_key, business_flow_no , business_status,business_status_desc,process_definition_name,process_definition_key,start_user_id,start_user_name,start_user_org_text,start_user_position_text,create_time instance_create_time FROM ext_run_instance where 1=1
and start_user_id=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} and end_status=4
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and process_definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.key??> and (title like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or start_user_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%') </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> </#if>
<#-- 获取多个用户的我的已办 --> <#if query.userIds??> and A.approve_user_id in( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)}) and A.approve_action!='start' union SELECT null ID_,instance_id PROC_INST_ID_ , process_definition_id PROC_DEF_ID_, -- CONCAT(process_definition_name,'- (',start_user_name,')') title NAME_ , null TASK_DEF_KEY_ ,create_time CREATE_TIME_, title, business_key,business_status,business_status_desc,process_definition_name,process_definition_key,start_user_id,start_user_name,start_user_org_text,start_user_position_text,create_time instance_create_time FROM ext_run_instance where 1=1
and start_user_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)}) and end_status=4
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and process_definition_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if> <#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.key??> and (title like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or start_user_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%') </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> </#if>
<#-- 获取我的发起 --> <#if query.startUserId??> and (A.approve_user_id = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserId)} and A.approve_action='start')
<#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if> </#if>
<#if query.startUserName??> and B.start_user_name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startUserName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.startLoginNo??> and B.start_login_no = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.startLoginNo)}' </#if>
<#-- 流程发起日期 --> <#if query.instanceCreateTimeBegin?? && query.instanceCreateTimeEnd??> and date_format(B.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.instanceCreateTimeEnd)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.instanceCreateTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.businessKey??> and B.business_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.businessKey)}' </#if>
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} </#if> </#if>

select distinct RES.* from ACT_RU_TASK RES left join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ WHERE 1=1
<#if query.processInstanceId??> and RES.PROC_INST_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processInstanceId)}' </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionId??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionId)}' </#if>

<#-- 获取"抄送我的"任务 --> SELECT task_id ID_, process_instance_id PROC_INST_ID_, definition_id PROC_DEF_ID_, definition_name process_definition_name, definition_key process_definition_key, task_name NAME_, A.create_time CREATE_TIME_, A.business_key, B.business_flow_no, B.business_status, B.business_status_desc, B.start_user_id, B.start_user_name, B.start_user_org_text, B.start_user_position_text, B.title, approve_action assign_forward_cc_action, assign_forward_cc_user_ids, approve_user_id assign_forward_cc_operater_user_id FROM ext_run_task_assign_forward_cc A LEFT JOIN ext_run_instance B ON A.process_instance_id = B.instance_id WHERE 1=1 and approve_action = 'copy_send'
<#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( B.start_user_name like '%${key}%' or B.process_definition_key like '%${key}%' or B.title like '%${key}%' or B.business_flow_no like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.processDefinitionKey??> and process_definition_key = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.processDefinitionKey)}' </#if>
<#-- 获取抄送我的 (多个用户) --> <#if query.userIdList?? &&(query.userIdList?size > 0)> and ( <#list query.userIdList as ccUserId> assign_forward_cc_user_ids LIKE '%,${ccUserId},%' <#if ccUserId_has_next>or</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#-- 移动端启用 --> <#if query.enableMobile??> and A.definition_id in (select ID_ from act_re_procdef where enable_mobile=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enableMobile)}) </#if>

<#-- 获取"任务参与者数据表"任务（我的待办，第三次优化！！！） --> select distinct RES.*,RUN.title,RUN.start_user_id, RUN.start_user_name,RUN.start_user_org_text,RUN.start_user_position_text, RUN.business_key,RUN.business_flow_no,RUN.business_status,RUN.business_status_desc,RUN.process_definition_key,RUN.process_definition_name,RUN.create_time instance_create_time from ACT_RU_TASK RES left join ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK I on I.TASK_ID_ = RES.ID_ left join ext_run_instance RUN on RES.PROC_INST_ID_= RUN.instance_id WHERE 1=1 <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( RUN.title like '%${key}%' or RUN.start_user_name like '%${key}%' or RUN.business_flow_no = '${key}' ) </#if>
<#if query.userId?? || query.userIds??> <#-- 含assign给我 、加签、转发 用户的待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward??> and RES.ID_ in (${query.taskIdsIncludeAssignForward}) </#if>
<#-- 去除加签\转发的"主人"待办 --> <#if query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward??> and RES.ID_ not in ( ${query.taskIdsEscapeAssignForward}) </#if> </#if>
<#-- 移动端启用 --> <#if query.enableMobile??> and RES.PROC_DEF_ID_ in (select ID_ from act_re_procdef where enable_mobile=${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.enableMobile)}) </#if>
<#if query.sortOrder?? && query.sortField??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} </#if>

<#-- 获取"直接分配给我的"任务（我的待办，辅助查询，第三次优化！！！） --> select ID_ from ACT_RU_TASK where 1=1
<#if query.userId??> and ASSIGNEE_ in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)}) </#if>
<#if query.userIds??> and ASSIGNEE_ in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)}) </#if>

<#-- 获取"我参与的用户"任务（我的待办，辅助查询,第三次优化！！！） --> select TASK_ID_ from ACT_RU_IDENTITYLINK where 1=1
<#if query.userId??> and ( (USER_ID_ in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)}) and TASK_ID_ is not null) or (GROUP_ID_ IN (select g.GROUP_ID_ from ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP g where g.USER_ID_ in ( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userId)} ))) ) </#if>
<#if query.userIds??> and ( (USER_ID_ in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)}) and TASK_ID_ is not null) or (GROUP_ID_ IN (select g.GROUP_ID_ from ACT_ID_MEMBERSHIP g where g.USER_ID_ in ( ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.userIds)} ))) ) </#if>
